description: A dystopian novel exploring totalitarianism, surveillance, and the manipulation of truth.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A classic novel addressing racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

description: A witty exploration of love, reputation, and class dynamics in Regency-era England.

description: A tragic story about wealth, obsession, and the elusive American Dream.

title: Moby-Dick
description: A philosophical adventure following Captain Ahab’s obsessive quest for revenge on a white whale.

title: War and Peace
description: An epic novel blending history, philosophy, and personal drama during the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: A psychological drama about guilt, morality, and redemption after a young man commits murder.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A coming-of-age story capturing teenage rebellion, alienation, and identity.

title: Brave New World
description: A futuristic novel examining technology, conformity, and engineered happiness.

description: A sweeping fantasy epic about the fight against an ancient evil and the power of friendship.

title: The Hobbit
description: A charming adventure story following Bilbo Baggins on an unexpected journey.

title: Jane Eyre
description: A novel about resilience, morality, and love, following the life of an orphaned governess.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A dark romantic tale of obsession and revenge set on the Yorkshire moors.

title: The Odyssey
description: Homer’s epic poem chronicling Odysseus’s perilous journey home after the Trojan War.

title: The Iliad
description: An ancient Greek epic depicting the final days of the Trojan War.

description: A satirical yet heartfelt tale of a delusional knight and his loyal squire.

description: Dante’s poetic journey through Hell, Purgatory, and Paradise.

description: A profound exploration of faith, free will, and moral conflict within a troubled family.

description: A historical drama set during the French Revolution, known for its themes of sacrifice and resurrection.

description: A grand tale of betrayal, imprisonment, and calculated revenge.

title: The Book Thief

description: The beginning of a magical series following a young wizard destined for greatness.

description: A fantasy tale where four siblings discover a magical world ruled by a tyrant.
